locs.text: ek ssh sarvar se judata hai.
{0} ke lie paasavard darj karen:
ssh diskanekt kiya gaya.
ssh sarvar se kanekt karane ka prayaas karane mein truti: {0}
nirdisht vikalp {0} amaany hai.
uttar sankhyaatmak hona chaahie.
vaapas jaane ke lie koee bhee kunjee dabaen.
ek kamaand nishpaadit karane ke lie ek ssh sarvar se judata hai.
aap kaise pramaanit karana chaahate hain?
nijee kunjee fail
kunjika
kunjee {0} ke lie paasafrez darj karen:
kunjee fail {0} maujood nahin hai.
nijee kunjee jodane ka prayaas karane mein truti:
ssh kamaand nishpaadit karane mein truti
ssh shel mein truti
likhen ki aap apane login prompt ko kaise chaahate hain. difolt shailee ka upayog karane ke lie khaalee chhod den. plesaholdars ko paars kiya jaata hai.
{0} ke lie nijee kunjee ka sthaan darj karen. kunjiyaan jodane ka kaam poora karane ke lie "q" likhen:
yah anubhaag aapako yah konfigar karane deta hai ki ssh kaise kaam karata hai.
ssh ke lie upayogakarta naam prompt shailee
ssh speed daayal mein nae kanekshan joden
yadi saksham hai, to ssh speed daayal mein ek naya kanekshan jodata hai.
setings pravishtiyaan praapt karane mein viphal.
ssh kanekt hai lekin klaint nahin hai.
kanekt karane ke lie ssh sarvar
pramaanit karane ke lie upayogakarta naam
doorasth roop se nishpaadit karane ke lie kamaand
